LanguageData.LTF_Research_AdvancedMedifuel.label: Medifuel advanced refining
LanguageData.LTF_Research_AdvancedMedifuel.descriptio: Unlocks big volumes medifuel refining. 50x and 150x recipes
LanguageData.LTF_Research_DrainTile.label: Draining tiles
LanguageData.LTF_Research_DrainTile.description: A very expensive tile that provides an unmatched cleanliness
LanguageData.LTF_Research_FilthCompressor.label: Filth compressor
LanguageData.LTF_Research_FilthCompressor.description: A vacuum system that will get rid of the filth in a room.
LanguageData.LTF_Research_MedBay_T1.label: Computer assisted medicine basics
LanguageData.LTF_Research_MedBay_T2.label: Advanced computer assisted medicine
LanguageData.LTF_Research_MedBay_T2.description: Allows to create a T2 Medbay with enhanced tending quality and regeneration ratio
LanguageData.LTF_Research_MedBay_T3.label: Military computer assisted medicine
LanguageData.LTF_Research_MedBay_T3.description: Allows to create a T3 Medbay with enhanced tending quality and regeneration ratio
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medifuel.label: Medifuel refining
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medifuel.description: Unlocks the medifuel formula and its refining. 1x and 10x recipes
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medifuel_alternative.label: Medifuel alternative recipe
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medifuel_alternative.descri: Unlocks an alternative medifuel recipe (10x) that relies on more conventionnal ingredients. Each insect meat unit is replaced by 1.5 regular meat unit and .5 vegetable unit.
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medifuel_alternative_bulk.d: Unlocks an alternative medifuel bulk recipe (50x) that relies on more conventionnal ingredients.
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medistone.label: Chemical lithotherapy
LanguageData.LTF_Research_Medistone.description: Allows the creation of medifuel treated chunks
